MskPhysioInfo: MSK physiotherapists use a range of techniques to help patients manage pain, improve mobility, and enhance their overall physical function. Although a technique such as manual therapy are sometimes used, the bulk of NHS physiotherapy treatment is exercises, education, and advice. The purpose of this web application is to provide you with these three components without having to wait many months to receive the same end result. Prior to continuing with the exercises and advice, it is important that you familiarise yourself with the red flag information. It is important that red flags are not missed. Please check the tabs below before continuing with the exercises.
